short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate selected text to any language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to translate any selected text to your preferred language using a simple and intuitive chatbox interface. You can select the desired language in the settings.
